html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-07152024-06-17MHA, HC
ActTobacco and Vaping Products Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Tobacco Products Appearance, Packaging and Labelling Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the TOBACCO PRODUCTS (APPEARANCE, PACKAGING AND LABELLING REGULATIONS) in order to (1) clarify terminology used to describe the display areas of health warnings; and (2) introduce minor technical amendments to provisions related to the placement of health warnings and toxicity information on secondary packages that are cartons, to ensure it properly reflects past tobacco labelling practices.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0137 Publication Date: 2024-07-03
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the TOBACCO PRODUCTS (APPEARANCE, PACKAGING AND LABELLING REGULATIONS) in order to (1) clarify terminology used to describe the display areas of health warnings; and (2) introduce minor technical amendments to provisions related to the placement of health warnings and toxicity information on secondary packages that are cartons, to ensure it properly reflects past tobacco labelling practices.
